title: Landmine Removal and Cycling Mentorship: Rebecca Rusch’s Be Good Foundation Is Bettering Lives Around the World
content:
The organization raised $72,000 for mentorship, scholarship, and landmine removal at the recent Rebecca's Private Idaho gravel race.

Read the full article at Landmine Removal and Cycling Mentorship: Rebecca Rusch’s Be Good Foundation Is Bettering Lives Around the World on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
